text: The Cook Islands Handball Association (CIHA) is the governing body for the sport of handball and beach handball in the Cook Islands. CIHA is member of the Oceania Continent Handball Federation (OCHF), International Handball Federation (IHF) and the Commonwealth Handball Association (CHA). ==National teams== * Cook Islands national handball team * Cook Islands national junior handball team * Cook Islands national youth handball team ==See also== * Oceania Handball Nations Cup * Oceania Handball Challenge Trophy ==References== * Oceania Continent Handball Federation ==External links== * Official webpage * Profile on International Handball Federation webpage Category:National members of the Oceania Continent Handball Federation Category:Sports organizations established in 1999 Category:Handball governing bodies Category:National members of the International Handball Federation Category:1999 establishments in the Cook Islands
title: Cook Islands Handball Association
